title: Launcher Problem
body:
Hello, I've been having this one problem with my launcher for a while now but I've never really thought of posting this on the forums. So Ill do it now. Today, I decided to update my LoL to the new update 5.10 (I think). It updated successfully. Then I clicked launch but nothing happened, the sound effect executed and everything but nothing happened so I just assumed it was lag and waited it out, The EULA popped up after a while, but after clicking accept it still refused to bring me to the login screen. I have googled for god knows how many hours on how to fix it, I've tried deleting my projects folder. Anyone have any other solutions? (I'd like to leave reinstalling as the last resort)
Thanks in advance

replies.body:
[SOLVED] 
So I tried reinstalling LoL -nope didnt work
Reinstalling all the .net frameworks - nope
Doing some crazy shit with cmd and regedit - nope
Reinstalling my OS -nope
Then finally after deleting a bunch more programs and further hours of googling I came across a GENIUS idea. What if... I DELETED MY ANTIVIRUS? 
...And thus on this glorious day I was finally able to endeavor to the login screen of LoL.

pffffft

but if you reinstalled your OS, then how come your anti-virus was still installed?
I installed my antivirus before I put on LoL because you know... security comes first

But if all you're going to do is install League of Legends, what's the point, really? Anti-virus is more for general use, where you're downloading files from file-sharing services or executing bits of code you didn't write.

>on the forums

These are the Boards Beta. The forums are sorely missed. Please know this distinction.

Have you tried running League as an admin (if on Windows, that is)?
